verses.verse: The <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

As it is <S%G1125>written<s%> in <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> My <S%G32>messenger<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> Your <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G3739>Who<s%> will <S%G2680>prepare<s%> Your <S%G3598>way;<s%>

The <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2090>'Make<s%> <S%G2090>ready<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4160>Make<s%> His <S%G5147>paths<s%> <S%G2117>straight.<s%>' "

<S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G907>Baptist<s%> <S%G1096>appeared<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> a <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> for the <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>

And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5561>country<s%> of <S%G2453>Judea<s%> was <S%G1607>going<s%> out to him, and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2415>people<s%> of <S%G2415>Jerusalem;<s%> and they were being <S%G907>baptized<s%> by him in the <S%G2446>Jordan<s%> <S%G4215>River,<s%> <S%G1843>confessing<s%> their <S%G266>sins.<s%>

And <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G1746>clothed<s%> with camel's <S%G2359>hair<s%> and [wore] a <S%G1193>leather<s%> <S%G2223>belt<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> his <S%G3751>waist,<s%> and his <S%G2068>diet<s%> was <S%G200>locusts<s%> and <S%G66>wild<s%> <S%G3192>honey.<s%>

And he was <S%G2784>preaching,<s%> and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3694>"After<s%> me One is <S%G2064>coming<s%> who is <S%G2478>mightier<s%> than I, and I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G2425>fit<s%> to <S%G2955>stoop<s%> <S%G2955>down<s%> and <S%G3089>untie<s%> the <S%G2438>thong<s%> of His <S%G5266>sandals.<s%>
"I <S%G907>baptized<s%> you with <S%G5204>water;<s%> but He will <S%G907>baptize<s%> you with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>"

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> from <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%> in <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and was <S%G907>baptized<s%> by <S%G2491>John<s%> in the <S%G2446>Jordan.<s%>

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G305>coming<s%> up out of the <S%G5204>water,<s%> He <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G4977>opening,<s%> and the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G4058>dove<s%> <S%G2597>descending<s%> upon Him;
and a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> out of the <S%G3772>heavens:<s%> "Thou <S%G1510>art<s%> My <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> in Thee I <S%G2106>am<s%> well-pleased."
And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G7057>impelled<s%> Him [to go] out into the <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

And He was in the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> <S%G5065>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> being <S%G3985>tempted<s%> by <S%G4567>Satan;<s%> and He was with the <S%G2342>wild<s%> <S%G2342>beasts,<s%> and the <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G1247>ministering<s%> to Him.

And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> had been <S%G3860>taken<s%> into <S%G3860>custody,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> into <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G2540>time<s%> is <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> and the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand;<s%> <S%G3340>repent<s%> and <S%G4100>believe<s%> in the <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>"

And as He was <S%G3855>going<s%> <S%G3855>along<s%> by the <S%G2281>Sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> He <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> and <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> <S%G7010>casting<s%> a <S%G7010>net<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea;<s%> for they were <S%G231>fishermen.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1205>"Follow<s%> <S%G3694><s%> Me, and I will <S%G4160>make<s%> you <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G231>fishers<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>"
And they <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> the <S%G1350>nets<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> Him.

And <S%G4260>going<s%> on a <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G4260>farther,<s%> He <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the [son] of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> his <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G846>who<s%> were <S%G2532>also<s%> in the <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G2675>mending<s%> the <S%G1350>nets.<s%>

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> He <S%G2564>called<s%> them; and they <S%G863>left<s%> their <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%> in the <S%G4143>boat<s%> with the <S%G3411>hired<s%> <S%G3411>servants,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> to <S%G3694>follow<s%> Him.
And they <S%G1531>went<s%> into <S%G2746>Capernaum;<s%> and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> He <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> and [began] to <S%G1321>teach.<s%>
And they were <S%G1605>amazed<s%> at His <S%G1322>teaching;<s%> for He was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> them as [one] <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> and not as the <S%G1122>scribes.<s%>
And <S%G2117>just<s%> <S%G2117>then<s%> there was in their <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> with an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit;<s%> and he <S%G349>cried<s%> out,

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do we have to do with You, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3479>Nazareth<s%>? Have You <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> us? I <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> You are â€“ the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G40>One<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Be <S%G5392>quiet,<s%> and <S%G1831>come<s%> out of him!"

And <S%G4682>throwing<s%> him into <S%G4682>convulsions,<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G5455>cried<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> and <S%G1831>came<s%> out of him.

And they were <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G2284>amazed,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that they <S%G4802>debated<s%> among <S%G846>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%>? A <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1322>teaching<s%> with <S%G1849>authority!<s%> He <S%G2004>commands<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> and they <S%G5219>obey<s%> Him."

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> the <S%G189>news<s%> about Him <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G3837>everywhere<s%> into <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G4066>surrounding<s%> <S%G4066>district<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> after they had <S%G1831>come<s%> out of the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> into the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4613>Simon<s%> and <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> with <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2491>John.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> Simon's mother-in-law was <S%G2621>lying<s%> <S%G2621>sick<s%> with a <S%G4445>fever;<s%> and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> they <S%G3004>spoke<s%> to Him <S%G4012>about<s%> her.
And He <S%G4334>came<s%> to her and <S%G1453>raised<s%> her up, <S%G2902>taking<s%> her by the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and the <S%G4446>fever<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> her, and she <S%G1247>waited<s%> on them.

And when <S%G3798>evening<s%> had <S%G1096>come,<s%> <S%G3753>after<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> had <S%G1416>set,<s%> they [began] <S%G5342>bringing<s%> to Him <S%G3956>all<s%> who were <S%G2192>ill<s%> <S%G2560><s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who were demon-possessed.
And the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> had <S%G1996>gathered<s%> at the <S%G2374>door.<s%>

And He <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> who were <S%G2192>ill<s%> <S%G2560><s%> with <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G3554>diseases,<s%> and <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1140>demons;<s%> and He was not <S%G863>permitting<s%> the <S%G1140>demons<s%> to <S%G2980>speak,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G3609>knew<s%> who He was.

And in the <S%G4404>early<s%> <S%G4404>morning,<s%> <S%G1773>while<s%> it was <S%G3029>still<s%> <S%G1773>dark,<s%> He <S%G450>arose<s%> and <S%G1831>went<s%> out and <S%G565>departed<s%> to a <S%G2048>lonely<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> and was <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G2546>there.<s%>
And <S%G4613>Simon<s%> and his <S%G3588>companions<s%> <S%G3326><s%> <S%G2614>hunted<s%> for Him;
and they <S%G2147>found<s%> Him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3956>"Everyone<s%> is <S%G2212>looking<s%> for You."

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Let us <S%G71>go<s%> <S%G7006>somewhere<s%> <S%G7006>else<s%> to the <S%G2969>towns<s%> <S%G2192>nearby,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that I may <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2532>also;<s%> for that is what I <S%G1831>came<s%> out for."
And He <S%G2064>went<s%> into their <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> and <S%G1544>casting<s%> out the <S%G1140>demons.<s%>

And a <S%G3015>leper<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to Him, <S%G3870>beseeching<s%> Him and <S%G1120>falling<s%> on his <S%G1120>knees<s%> <S%G1120>before<s%> Him, and <S%G3004>saying<s%> to Him, <S%G1437>"If<s%> You are <S%G2309>willing,<s%> You <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2511>make<s%> me <S%G2511>clean.<s%>"

And <S%G4697>moved<s%> with <S%G4697>compassion,<s%> He <S%G1614>stretched<s%> out His <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G681>touched<s%> him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "I <S%G2309>am<s%> <S%G2309>willing;<s%> be <S%G2511>cleansed.<s%>"
And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> the <S%G3014>leprosy<s%> <S%G565>left<s%> him and he was <S%G2511>cleansed.<s%>
And He <S%G1690>sternly<s%> <S%G1690>warned<s%> him and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G1544>sent<s%> him <S%G1544>away,<s%>

and He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3708>"See<s%> that you <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> to <S%G3367>anyone;<s%> but <S%G5217>go,<s%> <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> to the <S%G2409>priest<s%> and <S%G4374>offer<s%> for your <S%G2512>cleansing<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G4367>commanded,<s%> for a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> to them."

But he <S%G1831>went<s%> out and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G2784>proclaim<s%> it <S%G4183>freely<s%> and to <S%G1310>spread<s%> the <S%G3056>news<s%> <S%G1310>about,<s%> to <S%G5620>such<s%> an <S%G5620>extent<s%> that Jesus <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>longer<s%> <S%G5320>publicly<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> a <S%G4172>city,<s%> but <S%G1510>stayed<s%> out in <S%G2048>unpopulated<s%> <S%G5117>areas;<s%> and they were <S%G2064>coming<s%> to Him from <S%G3840>everywhere.<s%>
